settings.title: Pharmacy Information
settings.subtitle: Welcome to our pharmacy information page, where you can find a wealth of information about various medications, health conditions, and other pharmacy-related topics. Our goal is to provide you with accurate and reliable information that you can trust to help you make informed decisions about your health.

settings.title: Welzo is about empowering personal health!
settings.text1: Our mission at Welzo is to empower individuals to take control of their health and wellbeing through our convenient and accessible online platform. We are committed to providing a wide range of healthcare support, home health tests, and over-the-counter health and beauty products that are affordable, reliable, and easy to use. Our goal is to make it easy for everyone to access the resources they need to live their healthiest life possible, and to do so with compassion, integrity, and respect. At Welzo, we believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to achieve optimal health and wellbeing, and we are dedicated to making that a reality for all of our customers.
settings.text2: At Welzo, we are committed to improving health outcomes and promoting wellness for individuals and communities. We believe that by providing access to affordable and convenient healthcare support, we can help our customers take control of their health and live their best life. Our mission is to make healthcare accessible to everyone, and we will continue to innovate and improve our platform to better serve the needs of our customers.

settings.title: Working with regulated pharamacies
settings.text:
At our organization, we take great care to ensure that we only work with regulated pharmacies that are fully licensed and authorized to operate in their respective jurisdictions. This is an important part of our commitment to providing safe and reliable healthcare products and services to our customers.

We understand that working with regulated pharmacies is essential to ensuring that our customers receive high-quality medications and healthcare products that meet the highest standards of safety and efficacy. Regulated pharmacies are subject to rigorous standards and oversight by regulatory authorities, which helps to ensure that they adhere to best practices and comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

To ensure that we only work with regulated pharmacies, we conduct a thorough vetting process before partnering with any pharmacy. This process includes verifying the pharmacy's license and regulatory status, as well as their reputation and track record in the industry. We also regularly monitor our pharmacy partners to ensure that they continue to meet our high standards and maintain their regulatory compliance.

By working exclusively with regulated pharmacies, we are able to offer our customers peace of mind and confidence in the quality and safety of the products and services we provide. We are committed to maintaining these high standards and will continue to work diligently to ensure that we only partner with pharmacies that meet our strict criteria for quality and regulatory compliance.

settings.title: UKAS & CQC Registered Labs
settings.text:
Welzo has over eight different laboratories across the UK, Denmark and Italy. This enables us to cover a vast range of diagnostic tests, genetic tests, epigenetic tests and standard biomarkers.
All labs in the UK are both CQC and UKAS registered. In addition to this, our international labs also hold ISO accreditations.

settings.caption: Labs and accuracy
settings.text: We work with UKAS accredited labs in the UK, Italy and Denmark. Find out more about our labs and how our testing process works.

settings.caption: Customer stories
settings.text: We have helped over 500,000 patients get access to their healthcare needs. Read some of their stories below.
